title: Lyft to add autonomous shuttles in 2026 as Uber inks more self-driving deals

title: Apple broadens App Store’s age-rating system
description: Apple has expanded its age-rating system to include 13+, 16+, and 18+ ratings, in addition to the existing ratings for younger users.

title: Tesla is reportedly behind on its pledge to build 5,000 Optimus bots this year
description: Tesla is behind on its goal to produce at least 5,000 Optimus humanoid robots by the end of 2025.

title: Meta to stop selling political ads in the EU from October
description: In response to the European Union's incoming regulation of political advertising, Meta said on Friday that it would stop selling and showing political ads in the EU from October 2025.

title: Google is testing a vibe-coding app called Opal
description: Google is testing a new vibe-coding tool called Opal, available in the U.S. through Google Labs, that lets users quickly spin up web apps with just a few prompts.
